Lemon chunks are used in gnome cooking. One can obtain them by using a knife on a lemon and choosing the option to dice the lemon.

Lemon chunks are used as an ingredient in a Blurberry special. It is used in the second step of preparing the drink, and must be in the inventory along with orange chunks, equa leaves and a sliced lime to be able to pour a mixed special into a cocktail glass.

[[File:Lemon chunks detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Lemon chunks''' are used in [[gnome cooking]]. One can obtain them by using a [[knife]] on a [[lemon]] and choosing the option to dice the lemon.

Lemon chunks are used as an ingredient in a [[Blurberry special]]. It is used in the second step of preparing the drink, and must be in the inventory along with [[orange chunks]], [[equa leaves]] and a [[sliced lime]] to be able to pour a [[mixed special]] into a [[cocktail glass]].
